Maze.1: When Explicit Path is specified Spotmaze ignores the S1 and S2 tags
Maze.2: To ensure valid path, exactly one co-ordinate of two consective path points needs to remain unchanged
Maze.3: For eg [1,2]->[1,5] is valid, but [1,6]->[4,1] is invalid

Dev Mode.1: Turn on Dev mode to see numbering and file versions
Dev Mode.2: Check file version before running program, at https://jsonformatter.org/
Dev Mode.3: Check JSON file at https://jsononline.net/json-checker or https://jsonlint.com/
Dev Mode.4: In Dev mode, to avoid default file path, use querry (?) parameter. For eg https://spotmaze.world/USERID/?AddYourFileName.json
